subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Olympic Games
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Johnson, a brash competitor, delivered on his promise to win gold in 1984, at Sarajevo, but was severely injured in a 2001 comeback at age 40 aimed at winning back his ex-wife.
snippet: Johnson, a brash competitor, delivered on his promise to win gold in 1984, at Sarajevo, but was severely injured in a 2001 comeback at age 40 aimed at winning back his ex-wife.
